snippet.title: Arctic Awakening - Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1275550/Arctic_Awakening/

Arctic Awakening is an episodic narrative adventure set in the unforgiving Arctic. Your plane crashed in a storm, leaving only your AI drone for company as you journey to find your co-pilot and uncover the dark mysteries buried beneath the ice.

Coming to PC, Mac and game consoles in 2022.

Website: https://arcticawakening.com
Twitter: https://twitter.com/ArcticAwakening
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/GoldFireStudios/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/goldfirestudios/
